summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Certificate Generator application. Backend APIs fully functional after fixing template path issue. Frontend UI working well with all navigation, form interactions, and certificate generation/download flows operational.

fixed_issues.issue: Template path configuration bug in certificate generation
fixed_issues.description: Template paths were stored with '/static/' prefix but accessed with double static directory path
fixed_issues.fix_applied: Updated template_path storage to use relative paths without '/static/' prefix

design_issues.issue: Button scrolls to bottom instead of navigating to download page
design_issues.description: The 'Download Certificate' button on homepage scrolls to bottom rather than providing direct access to certificate download

passed_tests: Create Event form with template upload
Manual text position selection on template
View Certificates tab with event selection
Download page form and certificate download
